thread.title: Steph lapsley
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Steph lapsley

author: Steph lapsley
title: Steph lapsley
text: Picked up car on time and even returned it earlier than I thought which was great. No pressure to complete service advisories and was given a full break down on price options on phone from service stop. Man who collected my car told me which garage my car would be at, and gave me their number just in case so was completely at ease with it. Easy payment method with invoice sent via email straight after. Will use again.
